rewrite1:

- When you reach the tenth paragraph, change the line spacing to double. Then, set the spacing after the paragraph to the equivalent of 3 lines. Add a double underline for consistency, and ensure any italic formatting from before is cleared.

When you reach the eighth paragraph: employ italic styling and establish a right indent of negative 2 centimeters.
